sentences.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shū fàng zài chuāng tái shàng.
sentences.translation: Please put the book on the window sill.

sentences.simplifiedText: 每天早上，他都会坐在窗台上，看着外面的世界，思考人生。
sentences.traditionalText: 每天早上，他都會坐在窗台上，看著外面的世界，思考人生。
sentences.pinyin: Měitiān zǎoshang, tā dōu huì zuò zài chuāng tái shàng, kànzhe wàimiàn de shìjiè, sīkǎo rénshēng.
sentences.translation: Every morning, he would sit by the window sill, looking at the outside world, pondering about life.
